subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Viktor Tikhonov scored twice and Alex Ovechkin added a goal and two assists as Russia routed the United States, 6-1, for its third straight victory at the ice hockey world championship.
snippet: Viktor Tikhonov scored twice and Alex Ovechkin added a goal and two assists as Russia routed the United States, 6-1, for its third straight victory at the ice hockey world championship.
